Articles.Content:
i am no longer the developer of this mod, xxhansonmaxx has taking over for me.

[link](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132070-EARLY-WIP-CST-100-Replica-3-75m-7-Seat-Crew-Vehicle%21)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-20T21:08:30Z" title="08/20/2015 09:08  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 20, 2015</time> by Tristonwilson12**

> 
> we are hopefully hoping to find someone who can do textures for us!!

If theres one way to make sure you mod never get's finished, this is it.
i found someone anyway ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

> 
> If theres one way to make sure you mod never get's finished, this is it.

If you unwrap it well, I would be happy to texture them for you. Just make sure the UV map is nice and organized, send me a labeled version, and I'll see what I can do.
im finished with the CM. i just need to texture now
Looking good can't wait to see how it turns out ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Thanks!!!
**reese1221,** please clean your inbox.

> 
> **reese1221,** please clean your inbox.

thanks for noticing.. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif):D:D:D:

yes it is!!
